body_html: Hi @magnumw , I didn't run my code in double precision. Yeah, casting to double might help but it is better to see what is the underlying reason for this problem. It seems like Pytorch's devs don't pay attention to this issue. When having time, I will try to solve it.

body: Hi @magnumw , I didn't run my code in double precision. Yeah, casting to double might help but it is better to see what is the underlying reason for this problem. It seems like Pytorch's devs don't pay attention to this issue. When having time, I will try to solve it.
